tool_description: Organizes and manages multiple content pieces into a structured content calendar with strategic distribution and theme coordination.

calendar_duration.description: Number of days for the calendar (7-90)

content_pieces.description: Array of content descriptions or titles to organize

content_themes.description: Content themes or pillars for organization

posting_frequency.description: Overall posting frequency: high, medium, or low

priority_themes.description: Themes that should appear more frequently

campaign_dates.description: Special campaign dates in YYYY-MM-DD format

content_mix_strategy.description: Strategy for content distribution: balanced, theme_focused, or platform_optimized

error_messages: Invalid calendar duration: Must be between 7 and 90 days
Invalid posting frequency: Use one of [high, medium, low]
Invalid content mix strategy: Use one of [balanced, theme_focused, platform_optimized]
Too many content pieces: Maximum 100 content pieces allowed
Too many themes: Maximum 10 content themes allowed
Invalid date format: Use YYYY-MM-DD format for campaign dates
Platforms array error: Use platforms from [instagram, facebook, twitter, linkedin, tiktok]
usage: Specify calendar duration, content pieces, themes, platforms, and posting frequency. Optionally set priority themes, campaign dates, and content mix strategy. Returns organized content calendar with strategic scheduling.

calendar_overview.description: Summary of the content calendar structure and strategy

scheduled_dates.description: Array of dates for content publication in YYYY-MM-DD format

assigned_content.description: Content pieces assigned to each date

assigned_platforms.description: Platform assignments for each content piece

theme_distribution.description: Theme assigned to each scheduled content piece
